mapper.select: SELECT P_ID, P_TITLE, P_WRITER, DATE_FORMAT(P_CREATED, '%Y-%m-%d') as P_CREATED, P_HITCOUNT FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(P_WRITER, P_TITLE, P_TEXT) values (#{p_writer}, #{p_title}, #{p_text})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET P_TITLE = #{p_title}, P_TEXT = #{p_text} WHERE P_ID = #{p_id}
